body:
## What's Changed
* FEATURE: add github pull request template by @crydotsnake in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/75
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/76
* Bump django from 4.0.1 to 4.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/74
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/77
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/78
* Bump django from 4.0.2 to 4.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/79
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/80
* Bump django from 4.0.4 to 4.0.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/81
* Bump django from 4.0.6 to 4.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/83
* tests: start testing Django 4.1 and Django `main` branch by @kevinmarsh in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/85
* Add support for Django 4.1 and drop support for < 3.2 by @kevinmarsh in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/86
* build: Bump actions/setup-python from 1 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/89
* build: Bump github/codeql-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/90
* build: Bump liskin/gh-problem-matcher-wrap from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/93
* build: Bump django from 4.1.1 to 4.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/94
* build: Bump codecov/codecov-action from 1 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/91
* build: Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/92
* Release 4.0.0 by @marksweb in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/97

## New Contributors
* @crydotsnake made their first contribution in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/75
* @pre-commit-ci made their first contribution in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/76
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/74
* @kevinmarsh made their first contribution in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/85

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/compare/3.0.1...4.0.0

## What's Changed
* fix: Docs build by @marksweb in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/71
* fix: Inclusion of full tests package in tarball [#69] by @marksweb in https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/pull/72


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/django-cms/django-classy-tags/compare/3.0.0...3.0.1

name: Add Django 3.2 & 4.0 Support
body:
* Added support for Django 3.2 and 4.0
* Drop support for python 3.5 and 3.6

Thanks too @mariajgrimaldi for the contribution!
